rules.natural: If the FinTech fund invests in the AI platform, then the AI platform is regulated by the SEC.
Either the AI platform faces an outage, or the FinTech fund launches a token, or the FinTech fund acquires a show.
Provided that the AI platform uses blockchain, the FinTech fund is profitable.
If the AI platform is audited by KPMG, then it uses blockchain.
If the AI platform has a partnership with the food delivery company, then, whenever the AI platform is regulated by the SEC, it uses blockchain.
If the AI platform has a partnership with the streaming service, then, under the condition that the AI platform is regulated by the SEC, it uses blockchain.
Provided that the FinTech fund launches a token, the AI platform has a partnership with the food delivery company.
If the FinTech fund acquires a show, then the AI platform has a partnership with the streaming service.
If it is not the case that, whenever the AI platform is regulated by the SEC, it is audited by KPMG, then the AI platform is blacklisted by the SEC.

facts.natural: The FinTech fund invests in the AI platform.
It is not the case that the AI platform faces an outage.
The AI platform is not blacklisted by the SEC.
